content.summary: Transforming cigar shaped seen in eaton rapids, mi

content.detailedDescription: Fi report - by chance meeting with an acquaintance who is related to one of thewitnesses, the writer was referred to ______ and ______ who shared a briefencounter with an anomalous object on the night of may 20, 1984.  as related bythe witnesses, the event occurred as follows:having travelled to kalamazoo for a day of shopping, followed by a movie, thetwo were returning to ____ home outside the town of sturgis, michigan.  sometimeprobably between 10:00 and 10:15 p.M., driving in the familys ford bronco, theyturned south onto constantine road, a lightly trafficked county highwayconnecting the town of constantine and the small city of three rivers.  theywere several miles north of the indiana border in branch county. the vehicle wasnotyet up to highway speed when they approached an angular railroad crossing.  acontinuous line of trees on the left (east) side of the road ended just short ofthe tracks.  as the women reached the clearing, they witnessed an elongatedobject to their left and just ahead, hovering over a patch of small trees on thefar side of the tracks.  ____ immediately stopped the auto.  they described anobject approximately forty yards in length, tapering at either end.  the middleportion was seen as metallic at the top and also tapering.  the remainder of thecraft was shrouded in a thick mist resembling the consistency of a cloud.  alongthe lower perimeter (and presumed by the witnesses to extend the entirecircumference) were light green and rose colored lights, partially obscured bythe nearly opaque camouflage and in no discernable pattern.  the mist itselfappeared to have a silvery white, luminescent effect which, however did not castonto the trees just below.  from their vantage point some thirty yards from theobject, it appeared to be "creeping sideways" (i.E. toward the witnesses) fromits original position just above the tree branches.  shirley rolled down theside window but heard nothing.  the engine was left running and the headlightsremained on, with no effect to either.  the reactions of the two witnesses wereentirely different.  both immediately and unequivocally determined the object tobe unconventional, but their emotional responses were opposite.   ____ waselated, feeling privileged to witness a spectacle that she later portrayed as"one of the most beautiful things id ever seen."  ____ meanwhile, feltextremely threatened, fearful that the object would proceed above and stall thevehicle.  vocalizing her agitation, she argued that they might be abducted,given physical examinations, made to forget the experience, and left withtraumatic emotional disorders.  after some undetermined amount of time, perhapsa minute or two, ____ reluctantly shifted the vehicle into gear at ____sinsistence.  however, after moving forward about fifteen yards, _____ stoppedthe bronco a second time at the stop sign for the railroad tracks.  this, sheadmitted in the interview, was a ploy to delay their departure and furtherobserve the anomaly.  now melody became even more agitated, demanding that theyleave the area.  after another moment, ____ again proceeded forward and quicklyout of view of the object as a line of trees on the far side of the tracksobscured their view.  as they moved south down the road, ____ detected what shefelt was a less frightened tone in _____s comments.  conswquently, she suddenlyturned the vehicle around and raced back to the scene.  though they had beengone only perhaps one minute, there was no sign of the object when they reachedthe crossing.  the women then decided to continue north to the home of a workassociate of ____, who lives approximately two miles distant.  arising from hisbed, the gentleman did not share their enthusiasm and turned down ____s offerto search the countryside for the object.  they then returned to ___s home,whereupon they were told that ____s son and daughter-in-law had observed alarge, sparkling mass high in the sky at approximately the same time.  the writeconcludes that this was the re-entry of debris from the soviet soyuz t-10 spacecraft, as confirmed by a june 27, 1984 response from the norad spacesurveillance center.  upon return to the scene with the witneses in mid-july,several power lines were noted.  these were parallel to the road and sotraversed the treetops over which the object had hovered.  the next power linepole to the northeast has six large, cannister-type generators attached.  thewriter concludes that, in all probability, the presence of the power lines iscentral to the objects appearance.  it might be further speculated that thewitnesses came upon the scene by chance, rather than design, in that they hadturned onto constantine road from the west only a brief moment before theencounter.  a search of the area revealed nothing in the manner of a landingtrace.  five homes in the vicinity were approaced for possible additionalwitnesses.  no one was home at three, and calling cards with a messageconcerning the incident did not generate any response.  the fourth and fifthfamilies were unaware of anything unusual, either as an observation on the nightin question or discovery in the cornfields afterward. the two witnessesdisplayed genuine bewilderment at the event and were in no way seekingpublicity.  as portrayed by ____, "its hard enough being a farmers wifewithout something like this."  the fellow employee of ______, who has requestedanonymity, related that the women did approach him that night in an excitedstate.  he allows that he was uninterested in the subject and suggested thatthey go home.  in retrospect, ____ regrets having forced their departure fromthe scene since they will thus never know by what means the object departed. the writer concludes that this event was a genuine ce-1, coincidental to thesoviet launch vehicle reentry.Dan wright
content.summary: Ce-1 near three rivers, michigan
Ufo fight in sky
Stationary white light on clear day in middle of a

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i, and a friend were waiting outside at a carrabbas restaurant ingreensboro, nc.  we were sitting outside on a bench and i noticed the object tothe north.(7:20pmet)  my first thought was, ok, its probably just an airliner,or a small plane.  as it got closer, i felt pretty certain it wasnt a normalaircraft.  the object at the distance was light amber colored/goldish yellow, very faint.  it was moving ese, unknown speed.  i held my hand up to it withthumb and pinky finger extened it and it move from the thumb to the finger inabout 4 seconds, not sure how fast that is, but thought you guys could give anestimate. as it came close to over head i could make out a structure,it had whatlook like a cluster of small spheres within it moving in and out,within thecraft, no noise and a very faint glow around it.  i attracted a crowd of peoplearound me who also saw it, and one lady even let out a startled yelp. it movedoff to the southeast and eventually was out of view.
content.summary: Triangular-shape changing object, dull amber color

content.detailedDescription: Typed fi report- ______, who is a custodian at _____, finished her shift at 3:30pm and went home.  school was scheduled to open on sept. 1, 1987, therefore thejanitorial crew was trying to get all the classroom floors sealed on friday,august 28, 1987.  at 6:30 pm, ____, suddenly decided that she would return tothe school to help the crew finish the floors.  it was almost 7:00 pm when shereached he intersection of ____ and ____ road.  she noticed that the lights werestill off at a nearby restaurant.  the restaurant had had a fire a few daysbefore.  she arrived at the school at 7:00 pm.  the janitorial crew finished theclassroom floors shortly before 9:00 pm.  _____ said good-bye to everyone andheaded for her home on _____.   as she drove near the restaurant she noted thelights were now on.  this startled her because the fire had been caused by afaulty wire in the kitchen of the new restaurant.  something else drew herattention, causing her to look up.  ____ had already slowed to make the turnonto _____ road.  she was very startled to see a dark object hovering over allfour lanes of the highway.  she stated that the rectangular object had brightgreen lights on each of its corners.  the object was much darker than the sky,which was covered with clouds.  the green color of the lights reminded her oftraffic lights, as they blinked off and on.  there are no traffic lights at theintersection, nor are there any street lights.  ____ said that she was veryexcited but did not feel frightened or threatened by what she was seeing.  shedid however get a strange feeling that they knew she had seen them.  she couldnot say why she felt that way.  as she drove under the object, she decided notto make the left turn onto ____ road.  she continued east on ____ rd., droveunder the object, looked into the rearview mirror but could not see anything. she drove for approx. one quarter of a mile, turned left into a store parkinglot, looked back west but could not see the object.  she then drove west on ___rd. and turned north on ____ arriving at her home at 9:30 p.M. the early eveningaire was humid, therefore _____ was driving with the windows down.  the carsair conditioner had broken prior to the sighting.  she stated that she did nothear any sound as she approached and drove under the object.  she did not callanyone because she did not want the people to think that she was "nuts".  afterreading the flint journal on dec. 5th, she decided that she would give us acall, having saved our telephone number from the article.  she finally called uson dec. 16, 1987, making an appointment to see us after the holidays.  she wasable to meet with us on jan. 19, 1988.  present at the inteview were judykarns-trainee, new co-section director for genesee and lapeer counties, andgeorge and shirley coyne-co-state directors for michigan.  _____ seemed ratherembarrassed as she explained what she had seen.  she did not try to embellishthe sighting.  she merely stated what she had seen on august 28, 1987.  wechecked ____s background and found that she is a good employe, hard working,honest and well liked by all.  her family thought that she was teasing themabout her sighting until they noticed how very excited she was.  the clio pd wascontacted.  the officer we spoke with was very helpful.  he checked the logbooks one week prior to the august 28 sighting and one week after the sighting. no other sightings had been reported.  the weather check revealed that theevening was totally cloudy, with a temp of 69 degrees.  the wind was north at 13mph.  the evening was humid due to the heavy rains during the day.  it is ourconclusion that the witness did sight some unknown object.  there are no trafficlights or street lights in this area of ____ rd.  there was nothing inside thecar that could have caused a reflection.  the witness does wear glasses for hernearsighted vision, however she does not go anywhere without her glasses.  therewere no stars in the cloudy sky.
content.summary: Rectangular ufo - ce1 in clio, michigan

content.detailedDescription: I decided late on friday night december 14,2001, to sit outside and look at thestars because, there were lots of falling stars earlier so i wanted to gaze. isat where it was clear and u can see a ways from my yard. i am on a hill.I couldsee a radio tower in the distance. a bright white light caugt my eye just abovethe radio tower, so i started watching it. it stayed in the same place for awhile, but it was bobbing up and down and side to side.The radio tower flashesin sequence a red light. the white light which looked like a star startedflashing red too like it was copying the radio light.And then changed differentcolors like a strobe light but in a rainbow of colors.It moved all around theradio light and dimmed out and back on again. it got to the side and shot up andthen back down real quick like a flash. then it shot up strait up anddissapeared. this experience lasted at least 2 and a half hours.
content.summary: Saw a colorful light in the sky (not a plane)

content.detailedDescription: Fi report- at approximately 10:30 pm on friday, august 1, 1986, _______ and______ were fishing from a small boat in the middle of banksons lake in vanburen county michigan.  suddenly _____ noticed what appeared to be the landinglight of a large aircraft approaching from the south/southeast at an incrediblylow altitude.  as this was in the direction of the kalamazoo county airport, ___felt that it might be preparing to attempt a landing there.  he was concerned,however, that there were no runways there to accomodate so large a craft.  couldthis unknown object with what seemed to be a landing light be looking for asparsely populated area to attempt an emergency landing he wondered?  the objectwas perhaps 200-300 ft. high and about as long as a football field.  indescribing the object as we talked in kalamazoo, ____ looked at wings stadiumand said that it was a least that large.  a steady white light was emitted fromwhat appeared to be the front, while 3 red lights blinked steadily on its outeredges.  when it was almost directly in front of them and over the water, thewhite light suddenly made a brilliant flash and went out.  ____ blood pressureshot up when this occurred.  (in the past he had been hospitalized for highblood pressure so was familiar with what was happening to him.)  he became veryupset emotionally during this part of the experience, and after the flash bothmen were scared and shaky for some time.  during our discussion he also pointedout that neither man had been consuming alcohol, using drugs, nor taking anymedication.  the sky was clear that night and other conventional aircraft werespotted during the sighting.  the surrounding countryside was very still with nonoticeable wind so the water was very calm.  at this point they realized thatthere had never been any sound coming from this huge craft.  as they watched itpassing over the nearby trees and water, the red lights continued to blink andthe men noticed what ____ described as a "magic carpet effect".  this was whatappeared to be waves or a wavy effect between the blinking lights.  no scents ortemperature changes were ever observed by the witnesses.  however, ___speculated that the wavy effect might be heat rays.  likewise no color normarkings were ever seen although they did feel that it was definitely a solidobject.  _____ was sure that it was not a weather balloon, a helicopter, nor anyairplane or jet.  within 15 minutes it had passed out of view in the northwest. _____ reflected that it was going in the general direction of south haven onlake michigan where the palisades nuclear power plant is located.  he alsospeculated on the possibility that it was "taking pictures or energizing" duringthe flash.  ______ feels very strongly that this craft does not belong to theunited states - and if it did it should not have been flying where it was.  healso had a feeling that it was looking for something.  during the sighting healso recalled having said, "if they are from another intelligence, they are moreintelligent and have a cure for cancer."  during this sighting at least 3 otherboats were on the lake.  but if they were looking in the wrong direction ____mused, they probably would not have seen anything unusual.  there were, however,several people on the shore who saw it as the witnesses heard a lot of animateddiscussions going on.  _____ was also concerned about a young boy about 10 yearsold who kept shouting, "what is it?"  so far i have had no luck in locating him. after the sighting ____ went to the airport but found the radar tower hadclosed at 11 p.M.  (the supervisor of the kalamazoo county airport radar towertold me that there was nothing unusual sighted that night.  he also said thatanything that big and so bright as to cause eye damage would certainly have beenobserved at the tower. he added that after 14 years with the faa and before thatthe us air force there was only one true unknown that he was aware of.)  _____also filed a report with the state police in paw paw.  in addition he contactedthe faa in grand rapids and bob gribble of the national ufo reporting center inseattle, washington.  furthermore he called both the kalamazoo gazette and thedetroit news.  to this date neither newspaper has published anything about thissighting. (mike magner, reporter for the kalamazoo gazette plans to write anarticle after interviewing walt andrus)  on the night of this event _____ and_____ stayed together and made notes and drawings of what they had seen. themorning after _____ had bloodshot and watery eyes.  he felt at first that he hada cold in his eyes.  after two days they cleared up on their own.  since thesighting ____ has felt some stress and is still excited about the uniqueencounter he has had.  all of his family and friends have had a positivereaction to him, in fact he has received no negative reactions and some peopleeven say that they are envious of his experiences.  _______s eyes were muchmore seriously effected.  before he sought medical assistance for them, he and_____ met with fi dee allan on august 6 so that she could see his eyes.  thewhites of his eyes were completely pink and burning.  they were very matteredand puffy.  the left eye was in the worst condition with swelling anddiscoloration beneath that eye.  his doctor has diagnosed the condition as pinkeye and is treating it with antibiotics.  because of this and personal problems,_____ has been off work for some time.  as a result of these emotional andfamily problems we have not been able to interview him.
content.summary: Fishermen see object near banksons lake in michiga

content.detailedDescription: Witness 1 - when asked where were you and what you were doing at the time,witness 1 stated - "in car, going for groceries heading west on hazel.  whenasked what made you first notice the object, witness 2 stated, "was low in thesky and straight in front of me and was very obviously something id never seenbefore".  when asked what did you think the object was when you first noticedit, witness 2 stated, "defininitely a ufo-nothing id ever seen before".  whenasked to describe her actions and reactions during the sighting, she stated,"excitement, scared-turned around to get my boyfriend to show him".  shedescribes the object and its actions as, "kind of oblong with a slow rising humpon top and bottom, greenish windows on bottom with a line of very bright whitishwindows or lights just above green-moved slowly at first then erratically backand forth and headed for same direction".  she lost sight of the object when,"it all of a sudden disappeared to the south-had not seen it move so abruptlytill then.  it was gone in an instant".Witness 2 - when asked where were you and what you were doing at the time,witness 2 stated - "i was in the bath tub when my girl friend, now my wife, camein my parents house very excited telling me to come and see this.  i went withher, me driving in the car to see what she had seen.  i didnt so going home iswhen we sighted it."  when asked what made you first notice the object, witness1 stated, "i was looking for it".  when asked what did you think the object waswhen you first noticed it, witness 1 stated, "i dont know".  when asked todescribe his actions and reactions during the sighting, he stated, "surprise andcurious".  he describes the object and its actions as, "an oval oblong shapehovering when first sighted, with no noise at all then at a blink of an eye itmoved approx. 1 mile with no noise or exhaust from engine.  he lost sight of theobject when, "it just took off again at a blink of an eye, but we heard on thecb radio people talking about it in easton rapids.
content.summary: Oblong oval with greenish windows seen near lansin
Stationary objects with probes exiting bottom of o

content.detailedDescription: Summary report written by dan wright on july 27, 1983at 2:30 am, friday, july 22, 1983, the author received a telephone referal fromtrooper ______ of the flint post, michigan state police.  the post had receivedtwo calls five minutes apart after 1 am from the flushing area west of flint. both concerned an aerial object at treetop level over the countryside. unfortunately, the latter caller gave a previous address and phone number,rendering followup impossible.  trooper ____ was dispatched and visited theresidence of ______, who had witnessed the event with her 11 y/o son ___ andtheir guests, ____ of flint and her 11 y/o daughter ____.  the trooperquestioned the four and also two consumers power company lineman who wererepairing a downed wire at the site.  all power in the vicinity had been outsince 8 pm thursday.  the lineman had arrived at 12:50 am, ten minutes beforethe sighting.  their presence seems to have had a bearing on the events, as willbe further explained.  on his return to the post, trooper _____ contacted mufon,giving his impression that the witnesses were honest and relating their account. an appointment was set for that evening.  the ___ residence is one of severalnew homes in an area still basically agricultural, with cornfields and woodspredominant.  it is also on an east-west flight path of bishop internationalairport, located file miles away.  areas south and southwest of flint haveelicited several ufo reports over the past years.  _____ and her daughter hadarrived for a visit thursday evening and, when the power was interupted bythunderstorm activity, decided to remain until it was restored.  when theconsumers truck arrived, all four proceeded to the front porch to observe.  tenminutes later, ____ was locating constellations when she noticed two oversizedwhite lights hovering over a tree between two houses a hundred yards to thenortheast.  she called the others attention and the four stared at the lightsfor two to three minutes.  at that point, they were stationary and no soundemitted from the source.  each light was about two feet in diameter, and the twowere positioned closely.  the witnesses found it odd that such large beacons didnot appreciably illuminate the surroundings or irritate their eyes with aglaring effect.  at this point, the consumers vehicle was maneuvering into aditch to reach the utility pole with its elevated cradle.  one of the men stoodbehind, directing the other.  according to the witnesses, the truck then struckthe pole accidently, and the lights immediately rose up slightly, then went out. now they could identify the object as a domed disk with red lights above andbelow where the lights had shone, circling the dome and base.  the craft mayhave been rotating or, since the witnesses did not notice the extinguishedheadlamps revolving, a movie-marquee effect may have offered the appearance ofrotation.  the vehicle began to slowly approach the witnesses before abruptlyturning ninety degrees to the left (south).  it then glided across the road andover a field to a smallish woods two hundred yards distant.  ____ focused herattention on a band of shiny metal around the girth of the object, and allreported at least two sets of prongs (i.E. an inverted "v" consisting of tworods about six feet in length, extending from the perimeter of the underside.) these were also bright metallic.  according to the children, the "prongs"started to protrude from the vehicle only after it was in motion and heading forthe woods.  mary believed she spotted four such sets and assumed them to belanding gear.  the others noticed only two sets, one under the headlamps, theother positioned opposite.  the group agreed that the object had a very lightand fairly low-pitched "whirling" sound while in motion.  this, they remarked,was unlike that of an airplane or helicopter and was otherwise unrecognizable. when either above or slightly beyond the wooded area (which extends for roughly150 yards), the object glided down in a vertical descent until lost from viewbelow the treeline.  its path had carried the craft to the side and behind theutility employees, but neither realized its presence.  the four witnessesmaintained a vigil for nearly an hour afterward, however no reappearance was tooccur.  _______ and ______ used the terms "mesmerized" and "awe" to describetheir reactions to the anomoly, stating that they seemed compelled to watch asit hovered nearby.  this may of course have been quite naturally a psychologicalresponse but bears mentioning.  the witnesses are quite certain that the utilitytruck did not experience any sort of disruption to its lights or engine.  as theneighborhoods power was off, no other electrical disturbances could haveoccurred.  the family dog, a spaniel-collie mix, had begun pacing, barking in anunfriendly manner, and investigating windows and doors shortly before thesighting.  during the episode, it barked continously, though this may have beendue to the presence of the utility truck.  after the incident, it hid in thebasement and refused to answer its owners calls.  the following day, ______remarked, it was acting somewhat strangely, resting behind furniture normallyunfrequented and acting timid generally.   following interviews with the fourwitnesses, the author spent considerable time in and around the wooded area inquestion.  very few openings existed whereby a craft of the size described(larger in diameter than a full-sized auto) could have landed without breakingtree limbs, and no ground markings or vegetation scorched or swirled was found. the cornfield which lies beyond the woods contained several bare spots, butagain no indication of dehydration, compacting, scorching, or swirling of thecrop was evident.  several neighbors along both _____ and ___ roads were queriedregarding the incident, only one offering a possible insight.  _____ who livesacross and diagonally from the ____ residence, was awakened by her husband whophoned from his workplace to notify her that police had been sent to the area,ostensibly regarding a fire according to his second-hand information via cb. later the same night, at about 5 am, she awoke again to the strong odor of aburnt substance of some sort.  she could offer no explanation as to its origin. faa officials at bishop (airport) stated that the thunderstorms had interruptedpower at the facility sometime after 10 pm thursday.  an emergency generatorrestored most functions, but the north-south runway lights remained inoperableand so that runway was closed for the remainder of the night.  the airportsraw/bulk radar system had ceased functioning at 11 pm as scheduled.  the airportlog showed no light aircraft or helicopter int he area of the sighting near thetime given.  likewise, neither the genesse county sheriff department nor the airnational guard had aircraft in the vicinity that night.  as conveyed to the msptrooper, the consumers power employees were unaware of the events at hand.  theutility pole generator was dysfunctional when they arrived, and so theirattention was entirely centered on assessing and repairing the damage.  withlittle question, a power surge caused by lightning earlier in the evening hadcaused the problem.  the day and evening of thursday, july 21 was, weatherwise,atrocious throughout michigan.  several lines of thunderstorms crossed the lowerpeninsula, some with hail and damaging winds, and numerous communities werewithout electricity for many hours.  so, while inconclusive, it is certainlynoteworthy that the ______ and ________ observed the craft within an hour of theremaining cloud covers retreat to the east.  the national weather serviceoffice in flint indicated that at 1 am, the citys skies continued overcast at7000 ft., though by 2 am scattered clouds only remained.  moreover, the arrivalof repairmen within minutes of the sighting, coupled with the observation thatthe craft extinguished its headlamps and moved away within a second or so of thepole being struck, may not be coincidental.  allowing for some variances intheir accounts, there is no reason to suspect the witnesses report as given. in terms of the descriptive drawings, that of ___ is probably the least accuratein that she wears prescriptive lenses for astigmatism but did not have them onat the time.  further, ____ deferred in large part to the sketches of the twochildren, stating that she had concentrated on the bright metallic belt aroundthe vehicle together with the prongs underneath and so had noticed little inthe way of light configurations or shape of the craft.  the boy and girl,drawing separately from memory the next day, depicted the object in remarkablysimilar fashion.  it might be postulated that the bar of red light shown in_____ sketch was in actuality the metallic band seen by _____, with the glow ofred from a row of lights above giving misimpression that the metallic band wasalso lighted.  in summary, this appears to be a credible ce-1.  perhaps thegreater learning experience was gained by the vehicles occupants in respect tothe interruption and restoration of electrical power.  a summary statement is also included, written by dan wright, concerning thestate troopers report which wont be included here, however most informationfrom within the report is already included in the above summary.
content.summary: State trooper visits witnesses of ufo in flushing,

content.detailedDescription: Date of sighting-12-06-01 time 6:35pm.Place palm coast, flagler co. fl. jim wassitting on back deck when an object i first thought was a star was moving fromse to nw.I went inside to get binoculars and told jennifer to come out quick.Itracked the object which was starlike in appearance and i thought could be thespace station,or a satellite.The light was white and appeared to be selfgenerated. the object tracked straight overhead before disappearing to the nw.Atthe same time i was tracking object#1,jennifer observed a similar objecttracking east ;she then observed three additional similar objects travelingdirectly behind the first object she observed.The three objects appeared to belined up diagonally following the first object she observed all in an easterlydirection.We both then observed a similar object tracking from north to south.Weboth then observed a similar object tracking se to nw.I also observed a similarobject moving fromn to s with only binoculars;i couldt pick it up with the nakedeye and lost it when i tried again with binos.
content.summary: Ne fl coast numerous starlike objects fast and hig
See the witness statement at the bottom of this page,..I have sent j allen hynek, video of ufo, never rep
Viewed dark object at night, noticed marks/growth

content.detailedDescription: I got up around 5:30am to go to the bathroom adjoining the bedroom (at my sonshouse in erie,co)while there homer (my husband who didnt know i was inthere)ran into the door because it was dark.  while waiting for me he waslooking out the window adjacent to the bathroom door he said,  you should seethis!  i came out and saw the object that was lit up bright, the full length ofan angle.  it was going east from the west.  as it cleared the tree top itseemed to pick up speed and it disappeared.  homer said it was a triangle whenhe first saw itwhat i saw was the side of the angle.  it went in a straight line, no sound, thelights stayed stationary.  when i got up the next morning and told my familythey gave me strange looks and didnt say anything.  i later told mygranddaughter (tish knopp) who lives in parker co and she prompted me to reportto mufon3e she can be reached @303-840-3971. (homer and i reside in phoenix az)
content.summary: Saw lit up triangular shaped ufo
Weird ship over mesa arizona

content.detailedDescription: Witness 1 - i was outside running when i saw this triangle of lights coming fromthe river (st. clair) going west.  it went almost right over our house, red,slow, and pretty low.  i ran inside to get my mother and sisters and to get mycamera (minolta 35mm, with 64 asa film-daytime, thats what was in it.)  so weall watched it and listened but couldnt hear any sound. it was pretty huge, alot bigger than a jet.  it was going only like jogging speed in a straightline-west.  then it went up into the clouds or something and was gone.Witness 2 - ___ went outside to play with the dogs as he has done in the pastbefore turning in for the night.  we live in an area that is remote andeverything seems to be so quiet and peaceful so both of us usually look to thesky at night it just seems to add to the area.  well this was the case on theeve of sept. 14, 1981.  ____ looked to the sky and sighted the object hoveringover the northeast area.  he watched it thinking it to be a plane but noimmediate movement.  then the object started to move slowly to the southwest. as soon as ___ realized this was very slow moving he ran into the house to getme.  i was at the far end of the house getting ready for bed.  i couldntimagine anything so important that he would get that excited about.  3 or 4 minsto get out to see what the matter was.  i had enough time to watch the objectmove very slowly from east to west and out of sight.  the object didnt make anynoise until almost out of sight to the west then it made a "whoosh" sound.  wehad airplanes in the area all the time refueling and knew it was not one.  thedogs bark when planes go overhead but they didnt bark on this occasion.  theobject also was flying lower than airplanes fly in that area and again therewasnt any noise.
content.summary: Triangle of lights seen crossing st. clair river

content.detailedDescription: We were driving w on 10th street in ada, ok when we first sighted the object(s). it was large enough to notice in the sky behind a group of trees.  i said, mil,do you see that!?! she said yes and we turned n onto hope street to follow it(itwas first sighted in the nw corner of the sky).  we proceeded to follow it forthe next five blocks on hope.  during that time i rolled down my drivers sidewindow to better view it off to my left.  in the time we followed it down hopeit progresses from my left side to the middle of my front windshield (n)andcontinued to travel what looked like ne, decending slightly as it went.  myfirst reaction was that it was one big object and the three smaller objects werejust points on a large triangular craft
content.summary: Saw three separate object flying in a triangle pat

content.detailedDescription: Witness 1 - awakened by wife, "_____, i see it coming, i see it coming, wakeup."  i looked to the back of our lot (roughly southwest).  at first i could seenothing.  then i could see light through some branches high up on a line oftrees.  it appeared to be moving to my right and up some.  it could have beenrising but im more inclined to think it was heading towards me, but slightly tomy right on a level flight.  next it appeared between two tall tree tops.  ( imeasured it to be about 630 ft. from where i was.)  then, seeing only thelighted panels, it headed to my left, ese, slowly.  i did not see it move fastat any time.  it went out of sight behind the garage.  we ran out back but sawnothing else.Witness 2 - ____ and i retired for the day shortly before midnight on aug. 9  weread books after we got into bed.  ____ read approx. 20-25 minutes before hedecided to go to sleep.  i read for another 30-35 minutes.  it was probably 1:00am or when i got out of bed to use the bathroom.  i went directly back to bed. after lighting a cigarette i turned off the light and sat at the end of the bedsmoking while looking out the window.  my thoughts were of the deer who roam thewoods behind our house and open field.  suddenly i became aware of a reflectionof light on the tree line just southwest of the motorhome approx. 600 ft.  thereflection was from some lights that seemed to be rising slowly from the groundon the west side of the tree line.  when they rose high enough that i could seethem i reached over and shook my husband, "_____ wake up, i can see them, i cansee them coming."  he sat up in bed and moved closer to the window.  by thistime the object was on the east side of the tree line and it appeared to floatdownward a little at a time while moving in an easterly direction, but at thesame time it did not appear parallel because i could see all of the lights andonly part of the dome. there seemed to be three lights. the two that were evenappeared round.  they were or seemed to be closer together than headlights on acar.  the third light was either vertical or was reflected to look so.  behindthe lights i could see a red dome shaped object.  i (text or page of narrativeappears to be missing here- todd lemire)... up the tall grass and the objectappeared to be no more than 10 or 12 ft. above the grass.
content.summary: Nocturnal lights seen in flushing, michigan

content.detailedDescription: Witness 1- my wife and i were returning late from a bowling league.  as we drovesouth-east on river road., three miles out of flushing, ____ called my attentionto some lights to our left front.  what appeared to be large headlights could beseen pointing down at about a 45 degree angle.  the craft, which i could not seeagainst a dark sky, appeared to be heading southish at about a 100 ft. height. i was not aware of any other lights.  i slowed down to about 15-20 mph so thatif it maintained its present course and slow movement, it would cross the roadahead of us.  suddenly, without any change in attitude the craft was travelingparallel with us, just above the tree level and to the rear of a row of houseson the north side of the road.  it appeared to be settling lower as weapproached our driveway. (south side of road).  instead of turning in i speededup to go around a slight curve and we pulled left into a large parking lot of achurch some 150 yards past our drive.  we sat and waited for it to reappear.  itnever did so it had to have landed or crossed the river (flint).  at no timecould i discern a shape or hear any sound relative to its propulsion.  ourheadlights were on so it had to be aware of our movement.  the next day we madea search of cornfield and woods which it seemed to head into.  we found nothingsignificant.  the whole sighting took some 5-6 minutes.Witness 2s account is basically in agreement but goes into more detailconcerning the object description such as, the headlights appeared to belocated in the center of the crafts height and width, appearing to be 3-4 ft.Apart.  they either spread across its width, or reflected.  the lights were verybright but they did not hurt our eyes to look at them.  the craft was shiny andvery large.....I got the impression that it was oval shaped and was as long as abig boxcar.  i could not make out the outer edges.  from the headlights to thetop of the object it appeared to be very tall.  i would guess about 15 ft.  welost sight of it behind our neighbors house.  we did not hear any sound.  wecould not recall the engine changing sound, stopping, or stalling.
content.summary: Oval lights seen in flushing, michigan

content.detailedDescription: On aug. 23, 1983 i had already had two sightings so i was watching for the ufofrom our bedroom window.  i was waiting because i knew it would return.  ___ wasawakened by my movements at 1:30 am.  he looked at his watch and i ask him whattime it was.  we sat on the bed talking for a short while.  we heard a soundlike metal being crunched and we knew that someone had missed the curve just afew feet from our home.  we got out of bed and put our robes on so we cold goout on the front porch.  we listened but heard no other sounds.  ___ got a flashlight from the house and told me he was going to walk over by the curve to seeif anyone needed help.  he soon returned with a young man who was injured.  theboy said he must have fallen asleep and gone off the road hitting mail boxes andtwo trees.  ___ called the boys family then helped him clean the blood from hisface and hands.  we waited form the family to arrive.  the boys father arrivedsomewhere near 2:00 am. ___, the boy and the father went over to the curve wherethe accident occurred.  by the time they walked to the car i could hear somesirens coming.  in a few minutes there was 3 police cars, a fire fighting crewand an ambulance on the scene.  i stayed on the porch, standing at the east endso i could watch.  i do not know how i knew the ufo was there but i suddenlyknew that it was.  i turned my head and looked back toward the southeast.  thereit was - sitting very still.  it appeared to be about 75 ft. from the ground and100 to 150 feet from where i stood on the porch.  the red lights were shiningand i could not make out any fine pattern to the lights.  the whole craft wasreflecting red lights from the emergency equipment.  it reminded me of red taillights reflecting on a chrome car bumper.  i jumped from the porch to alert ___. when i did it made a very fast turn and started moving south toward the woodedarea behind our home.  the back side of the craft also reflected red from thelights giving it a soft yet shiny red glow.  the craft looked like two pieplates fitted together and there were 2 tripods on the undercarriage.  thetripods were also bright and shiny.  it went slowly out of sight.  at this timei thought the craft to be about the size of a semi-trailer.  approx. time ofsighting 2:15 am.  i was really shaken by this sighting.  later i felt veryuncomfortable and could not get to sleep.  there was something on top but icannot recall what it even looked like.
content.summary: Ovalish object seen in flushing, michigan

content.detailedDescription: On aug. 19 at 11:20 pm ____ and i were still on the patio visiting, watching. suddenly it was just there above the treetops.  it was not moving at all and ithad red lights on.  we both jumped from our chairs and ran toward the barn.  thered lights went off andone light came on.  i yelled "______ get the guys" andshe stopped and was going to turn back toward the house.  just then anotherlight came on and it made a 90 degree turn and shot away from us back toward thewoods.  this happened on the evening of the morning you guys flew over our area. on august 23 at 1:45 am a young fellow missed the curve and hit a tree.  wewere awake so we heard the crash.  _____ went over to the car to see if he couldhelp the young man.  by 2:15 there were police cars (2) abmulance and fire truckon the scene.  ____ was at the accident site and i was standing on the porchwatching.  i do not know how i knew but i knew the ufo was there.  i turned andthere it was about 75-100 ft above the ground and about 100 to 150 feet from thehouse.  there were only red lights on.  it looked like a row of them.  the redlights from the emergency equipment was reflecting off of it also. i jumped offthe porch and it turned (90 degrees again) and moved towards the woods. i got agood look at it this time.  it was a very bright metallic and the red lights isaw from the front were reflected off the back and it gave it a slight red glow. there were tripods on the undercarriage.  it looked like 2 pie plates turnedupside down and fitted together.  the edges were not as shape as a pie plate. _____ was really disgusted because he did not get to see it again.  im stillkeeping watch at night and i know we will see it again.  somehow, somewherethere must be some answers.  it must have a hiding place some where near ourhome or it moves faster than we realize.  never the less, im really excitedabout it and plan to keep my eyes wide open.
content.summary: Nocturnal lights seen in flushing, michigan

content.detailedDescription: Witness 2 - i was driving north on dillion road when on my right side i saw twobright lights in the sky.  then out of no where a third bright light at a highrate of speed zoomed up and stopped by the other two.  they were in perfectformation, like so: (witness sketch here).  then came over my car and put a spotlight on me and my car.  it followed me north on dillion rd.  i turned east onpierson rd.  it then followed me for about 1/4 mile then was gone in a second. had really bright lights, two had pipes and what looked like designs on thebottomwitness 1 - on wednesday feb. 22 around 8:00 pm, my boyfriend left my house.  at8:05 he called to tell me about his experience on the way home.  he said therewas an aircraft in the sky that had two white lights and two red ones.  it wasjoined by a third white light and then it beamed a spotlight on the ground. then is shone across eds car.  when he had finished telling me his story i feltsomewhat skeptical.  i figured there was probably a helicopter search going on. as soon as i hung up the phone, i went to bed. im not sure of the amount oftime that passed but it couldnt have been more than a couple of minutes beforei heard a loud roaring sound.  i jumped out of bed and ran to the window.  therewas a large object above my yard. it had 3 large sections of white light with 2small red lights, one on the top and one on the bottom. i then ran upstairs,grabbed my glasses and called ed to tell him i saw something also.  two morepassed over head and turned south and then back eastward.  at this time, icalled the police to find out if there was a search being conducted or anymilitary excersizes taking place.  i was told that there was nothing.  some timeafter i got off of the phone 2 more ships came in an east direction and werejoined by a third ship that had been traveling south and turned east.  theypassed a few miles south of my house.  approximately 5 minutes later one morepassed directly over my house and was very loud like the first one.
content.summary: 3 lights in formation shine spot light on car

content.detailedDescription: On january 5, 2001 at approximately 8:00 pm, the witness was traveling eastboundon i-94, between race road exit and the truck weigh station.  he initiallyobserved an intensely bright light at approximately a 45 degree angle (initiallythought it was a planet), at 2:00 ese, south of the highway, out of his frontcar window.  witness described the light as the size of a half-dollar held atarms length.  the witness continued to observe the light as he drove along thehighway at approx. 60-65 mph.  the light was fast moving and intensely brightwhen he observed it at 11:00 (ene) over the drivers side-view mirror, north ofthe highway.  at the time the light reached the weigh station, it was describedby the witness as a huge, a half-dollar sized at arms length, intenselybright glowing ball of light at nine oclock (n). at this point it seemed to bestationary while the witness drove by.  suddenly, as the witness reported, theball of light shot up and away and "blinked off.  he reported a brighttrapezoidal-shaped streak was left on his eye, but he clarified it was not atail from the object.  the witness reported that he traveled approximately 3-4miles during the sighting and the duration of the sighting was between 1-5minutes, though it felt like 15 seconds.  the witness also indicated that thevelocity increased, decreased, and then increased again.  the witness reportedthe sky conditions were partly cloudy.  there were large open areas, whichrevealed a bright, star-filled sky.  the moon was bright just west and south ofzenith (straight above and a bit behind him, at 5:00 high).  the witness alsoreported observing two aircraft at the time of the sighting.  the first aircraftmoved from ne to nw at a higher altitude, slower moving with blinking lights. the second aircraft was moving nw to ne, also slower moving at a higher altitudewith blinking lights.  the witness further indicated that driving past the samearea at 10:00 pm the same night, he noticed the area to be very dark and free oftowers, floodlights, large homes, industrial or other electrical light sources. however, he related that driving past the same area two weeks later on january19, 2001, he noticed towers, lights and other electrical equipment that he didnot see two weeks earlier.  the witness reported that he felt a lot of anxietyand fear when he saw the object.  he relayed that he ended up crying, which isnot his usual character.  when he arrived at the home of his friends in annarbor, he was upset.  he recounted his story to them and reported they believedhim because of his state of mind.
content.summary: Bright ball of light seen in jackson, michigan
Seen two cigar shaped disks,one following the othe

content.detailedDescription: Looking to the northwest, witness #2 saw four lights in a triangle formation. the lights appeared to be embedded in a black-grey triangle shapedobject.Witness #2 alerted witness #1 and #3 and drew their attention to thesighting.They confirmed the size and shape of the object as it passed overhead,and visually followed the object as it headed in a southeast direction.  it madevery little to no noise as it travelled directly overhead.Witness #2, a licensedpilot, estimated crafts speed at 300 miles per hour.  shortly thereafter, about3 minutes, a two fighter formation could be seen following the path of theobject.
content.summary: Four light disks embeded in a dark grey or black t
While driving outside enumclaw, wa we saw a red fi

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in my neighborhood near the city of houston around 6:45.Im an amateur astronomer and often watch the night sky. i saw a satelliteapproach from the nw. it was on a path leading it almost directly overhead. iwatched it for7e 1 minute and before it was directly overhead, it completely stopped moving. ihad it positioned between to telephone lines and there was no apparent movement.After about 2 minutes, it began moving again at the same rate of speed in thesame direction. i then saw another satellite approaching from the w-nw, on asomewhat lower path. when it reached about 60 degrees above the horizon, it toocompletely stopped for a couple of minutes. i saw a third satellite approachfrom the west, but the cloud cover became thick and i could no longer see it. ihad the impression that a small point of light briefly flashed from the firstsatellite, i think this was before it stopped. ive seen a lot of satellites andthe iss, but have never seen any stop before.
content.summary: Saw 2 satellites approach, stop, then continue
2 wit. saw shooting--like obj. make a r.Angleturn
Aug22,2001 bloomington,il
